UI

Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • UI.Screen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class Screen
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Class to create a single jFrame 'Screen' which handles the user interactions(input/output) with the flight reservation system.
    Author:
    Anudeep Ghosh
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
